title: Forza Motorsport 7 Ultimate Edition + 4K Videos + ALL DLCs
description:
Release Date: October 3, 2017 
Genres/Tags: Racing, Simulation, 3D 
Developer: Turn 10 Studios 
Publisher: Microsoft Studios 
Platform: PC [Repack] 
Crack: built-in (CODEX, modified by MnSXx) 

DLC's :

Doritos Forza Motorsport 7 Car Pack
Forza Motorsport 7 Car Pass
Forza Motorsport 7 Fate of the Furious Car Pack
Forza Motorsport 7 Hoonigan Car Pack
Forza Motorsport 7 VIP
Samsung QLED TV Forza Motorsport 7 Car Pack
Totino's Forza Motorsport 7 Car Pack

Instructions : 

Mount
It's recommend to install Windows Store, Xbox and Xbox Identity applications for crack to work. Also virtualization (Hyper-V Support) must be set off either in OS settings and/or in BIOS. If the setup won't turn on Developer Mode on your OS, turn it on manually
Windows virtualization (Hyper-V Support) must be set off either in OS settings and/or in BIOS
Developer Mode must be turned on your OS.The installer tries to turn it on automatically, but if fails, make sure to turn it on manually
Install
If you don't uncheck the option in the installer, the crack will automatically apply after final files verification
If you unckecked the option, you must run the crack manually from the desktop icon
After the crack applied, FM7 will appear on your Start Menu - you can drag the game to desktop and make a shortcut icon. Or you can use an existing game icon if you wish
If the crack still doesn't work - something is off with reqirements listed above: Windows version, dev.mode, etc.
Upon the first launch the game will ask you for folder to keep saves in. You either create a new subfolder, like "FM7" or use any existing folder
Play !
